connection_failed_tip:
if you are using:
 * geth, append: --rpc --rpccorsdomain='*' --rpcaddr='@HOST' --rpcport='@PORT'
 * parity, append: --geth --jsonrpc-hosts all --rpcaddr @HOST --rpcport @PORT 
 * ethereumjs-testrpc, try: testrpc -h @HOST -p @PORT

check also if your node or this machine is allowed to connect (firewall, port, etc..)
